text: Khan Bonflis (Kan Bonflis; c. 1972 - January 5, 2015) was a British actor of Asian origin. He was known for his small roles in Tomorrow Never Dies, Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace, Batman Begins, and in Skyfall. Bonflis died while rehearsing for a play in London, aged 42. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1972 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Unexplained deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors
title: Khan Bonfils
